info.name: Atlas Sofa 4S
info.LongDescription:
OVERVIEW
Big, bold and beautiful – the four-seat Atlas is a huge, sink-in sofa that’s wide enough and long enough to fall asleep on. This is a sofa that capitalises on the slab trend in European sofas, but the Atlas is not just a statement piece, it is also luxuriously comfortable and superbly finished.
A key feature is the natural variations of the high-quality semi-aniline leather, which softly ages over time. Another stylish feature is the twin-stitched French seams on the leather panels. This detail complements the large scale of the sofa – room enough for all the family!
 
“Displaying weathering through use and lightening in areas of tension, the Atlas features the well-worn handle of a vintage flight jacket.”  Freedom sofa buyer.
info.description:
Shown in Randolph Leather in Tan.

A key feature is the natural variations of the high-quality semi-aniline leather, which softly ages over time. Another stylish feature is the twin-stitched French seams on the leather panels. This detail complements the large scale of the sofa – room enough for all the family!
 
“Displaying weathering through use and lightening in areas of tension, the Atlas features the well-worn handle of a vintage flight jacket.” Freedom sofa buyer.
